00031   void InitFrame() {
00032     mNotebook=new wxAuiNotebook(mAuiPanel);
00033 
00034     mSpinGrid=new SpinGrid(mNotebook);
00035 
00036     mGLDisplay=new glDisplay(mNotebook);
00037 
00038     // add the panes to the manager
00039     mNotebook->AddPage(mGLDisplay, wxT("3D View"));
00040     mNotebook->AddPage(mSpinGrid, wxT("Grid View"));
00041 
00042     mAuiPanel->GetSizer()->Add(mNotebook,1,wxEXPAND);
00043   }
00044 
00045 private:
00046   wxAuiNotebook* mNotebook;

00049 };
